insert into tbl_gasstation(official_id,name,short_name,director,phone,address,company,longitude,latitude,cover_radius,cover_lonlatlist_region,remark) values
( #{item.officialId}, #{item.name}, #{item.abbr}, ifnull(#{item.director},''), ifnull(#{item.phone},''), ifnull(#{item.address},''), ifnull(#{item.company},''), ifnull(#{item.longitude},0), ifnull(#{item.latitude},0), ifnull(#{item.radius},0), #{item.cover}, ifnull(#{item.remark},'') )
mapper.update: update tbl_gasstation set official_id=#{officialId}, name=#{name}, short_name=#{abbr}, director=#{director}, phone=#{phone}, address=#{address}, company=#{company}, longitude=#{longitude}, latitude=#{latitude}, cover_radius=#{radius}, cover_lonlatlist_region=#{cover}, remark=ifnull(#{remark},'') where id=#{id}

SELECT IF(ISNULL(g.short_name) || LENGTH(TRIM(g.short_name)) < 1, g.`name`, g.short_name) `name`, g.longitude, g.latitude, g.cover_radius, g.cover_lonlatlist_region, t.handset_device_id, t.device_version FROM tbl_gasstation g LEFT JOIN ( SELECT h.handset_device_id, h.gasstation_id, d.device_version FROM tbl_handset h, tbl_device d WHERE h.handset_device_id = d.device_id ) t ON g.id = t.gasstation_id WHERE g.id = #{id}
